sentences.en: Bears are inactive during the winter.
During these eight years my life was uniform; but not unhappy, because it was not inactive.
sentences.cn: 在这八年当中,我的生活是始终如一的, 但不能说不幸福, 因为并不死气沉沉.

sentences.en: Ethylene and trans - dichloroethylene are both inactive in the infra - red in this region.
sentences.cn: 乙烯和反式二氯乙烯在红外光谱的这个区域都无活性.

sentences.en: He certainly was not politically inactive.
sentences.cn: 他政治上当然不是无所作为。
他一直压根儿无事可做.

sentences.en: He had been totally inactive for two weeks.
sentences.cn: 他已经闲了两个星期了.

sentences.en: He would idle away many dull inactive hours daydreaming about his child.
sentences.cn: 他有时会一连几个钟头什么事儿也不干,痴呆呆地只顾想他的孩子.

sentences.en: It also exists in active and inactive forms.
sentences.cn: 它也存在着活跃的和不活跃的两种类型.

sentences.en: It has been reported that 75 % of the mines producing these wastes are inactive and abandoned.
sentences.cn: 据报道,产生这些废水的矿有75%是暂停不用的和废弃的.

sentences.en: Presley was a confirmed dreamer, irresolute, inactive, with a strong tendency to melancholy.
sentences.cn: 普瑞斯莱是个不可救药的梦想家, 优柔寡断, 喜静厌动, 常常会觉得郁郁不乐.

sentences.en: The brain cells are inactive during sleep.
sentences.cn: 在睡觉时脑细胞不活跃。

sentences.en: The inactive components are important too.
sentences.cn: 非活性的成分也是重要的.

sentences.en: The satellite had been inactive since its launch two years ago.
sentences.cn: 该卫星自从两年前发射以来一直没起作用。
这座火山已进入休止状态.

sentences.en: While Joe sleeps, a large percentage of his capillaries are inactive.
sentences.cn: 当乔睡觉时, 他的毛细血管大部分是不工作的.

sentences.en: Young people are becoming politically inactive.
sentences.cn: 年轻人变得不热衷政治了。

words.tran_cn: [生物] 失活；[化学] 钝化（作用）
静止；不活泼；休止状态；不放射性
使不活动；使不活泼；阻止活动

trans.tran_cn: 不活动的，不活跃的，懒散的，怠惰的，闲置的，[化]钝性的
trans.tran_en: not doing anything, not working, or not moving
